xwikidoc.name: ShowOutdatedTranslationsSheet
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: ShowOutdatedTranslationsSheet
xwikidoc.content:
#** * This page shows all the outdated translations for a language * @type sheet *# #if($request.language) #set($trans = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("L10NCode.L10NGroovy")) $trans.setContext($context, $xwiki) Outdated translations:
#set($list = $trans.getOutdatedTranslations($doc.web, "core", $request.language)) #foreach($item in $list) * [$item] #end #else Select language to show outdated translations for: [fr>$doc.fullName?language=fr] [de>$doc.fullName?language=de] [es>$doc.fullName?language=es] #end
